name: Suspicious Midsommar Torte
desc: A small cake made from Midsommar Berries. The frosting is uneven and messy, leaving the Midsommar Berry on top barely able to stay in place. There are cracks visible in the base... Maybe it's best to close your eyes before taking a bite.

customize.name: Recipe: Midsommar Torte
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Midsommar Torte.

customize.name: Midsommar Torte
customize.desc: A small cake made from Midsommar Berries. The cake base is first baked, then drizzled with berry jam and Smetana before being topped with a decorative Midsommar Berry. Its sweet taste and adorable appearance make it a small but popular surprise on festival days.

customize.name: Delicious Midsommar Torte
customize.desc: A small cake made from Midsommar Berries. One spoonful is all it takes to whisk you away to a lush berry forest. Amid the vibrant, lively sweetness, there is a hint of refreshing tartness imparted by the Smetana. This cake raises the festive mood to the peak!

customize.name: Suspicious Midsommar Torte
customize.desc: A small cake made from Midsommar Berries. The frosting is uneven and messy, leaving the Midsommar Berry on top barely able to stay in place. There are cracks visible in the base... Maybe it's best to close your eyes before taking a bite.

customize.name: Midsommar Berry
customize.desc:
A fruit that grows in the warmer parts of Nod-Krai. It is beloved by animals emerging from winter and hungry children alike.
In the legacy of the Frostmoon Scions, Midsommar Berries are regarded as a symbol of life and abundance, for they only flourish during the warmth of spring and summer.
There is a tale that tells of the endless struggle between the King of Winter Holly and the King of Summer Oak — twin monarchs that slay each other as the seasons change, returning from the underworld to rule in turn until the end of time. Most Snezhnayan scholars dismiss this as a primitive religious metaphor for the alternating seasons — or at least that's what they tell themselves.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Smetana
customize.desc: A dairy product produced through complex processes such as separation and fermentation. It has a smooth texture and a refreshing sourness, often serving as the finishing touch in many dishes.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
